article_title: Kindred to close 2 hospitals, eliminate 246 jobs
article_text:
Kindred to close 2 hospitals, eliminate 246 jobs

Kindred Healthcare has announced it is consolidating its Houston-area services, eliminating all positions at its Channelview and north Houston hospitals.

article_metadata.description: Kindred is a public company that operates hundreds of health care facilities and services, including transitional care and rehabilitation hospitals, nursing centers, home health and hospice care nationwide.  In a written statement, Michael Warrington, senior vice president of Kindred's southeast region, said the majority of terminated employees would be hired at other Kindred hospitals.  "If any patients need continued care after the hospital closes, please be assured that we will take every step necessary to help them in relocating, including arranging for requested transfers and paying for any expenses," according to statements on Kindred's websites.
article_metadata.author.name: By Lora Hines
